translations: 使社会化；使社会主义化
参加社交活动；发生社交往来（等于 socialize）

sentences.sentence: She said: "Marriage, or any committed relationship, is good for us." It socialises us.
sentences.translation: 他说：“婚姻或任何一种承诺关系对我们大家都有利。”它能促进我们相互关怀。

sentences.sentence: To the untrained eye this has not affected her behaviour at all; she moves, eats and socialises normally.
sentences.translation: 在外行人看来，这次破坏全然没有影响到她的活动：她行动自如，像往常一样进食、玩耍。
